devdoc.details: Crowdsale template implementation, providing fair fundraising functionality

deposit(uint256,address,bytes).details: Deposit to purchase shares (user initiated, requires manager signature)

getDepositSignatureMessage(uint256,addre.details: Generate deposit signature message hash for backend signing

getManagerNonce().details: Query manager nonce for signature verification

getRedeemSignatureMessage(uint256,addres.details: Generate redeem signature message hash for backend signing

isFundingPeriodActive().details: Check if funding period is active

offChainDeposit(uint256,address,bytes).details: Off-chain deposit (only manager can call, requires DRDS signature verification)

offChainRedeem(address).details: Off-chain redeem all shares (only manager can call)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

redeem(address,bytes).details: Redeem all shares (user initiated, requires manager signature)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpauseTokenOnFundingSuccess().details: Unpause token trading when funding is successful This function should be called after funding period ends and funding is successful

withdrawFundingAssets().details: Withdraw funding assets (only when funding is successful)

withdrawManageFee().details: Withdraw management fee (only when funding is successful)

devdoc.title: Crowdsale

userdoc.notice: Supports on-chain and off-chain deposits, refundable if funding fails
